Course_Name: [SoSe 2024] M4-A Planning as Political Process 2 _ Seminar A: Contested participation: scrutinizing planning practices of citizen involvement in light of critical planning theory

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Room EB 224 will be open tomorrow

Messages.Author: Vanessa Vogel
Messages.Content: Dear all, tomorrow there will be no seminar meeting, as you already know, but I will open the room EB 224 for you to work in during the seminar time. See you soon, Vanessa

Messages.Author: Enrico Gualini
Messages.Content: Dear seminar participants, the online evaluation form of our seminar is now available: https://befragung.tu-berlin.de/evasys/online.php?p=GG95C Please give your feedback before July 7. Many thanks

Messages.Author: Vanessa Vogel
Messages.Content: Dear all,  Please prepare your posters for the final session in DIN A0 format.  You can decide how many posters you need depending on your contents, one or two posters are recommended.  To print your posters you can use the services and moderate prices of the CIP-Pool in EB 420. If you have any struggles with printing the posters, please do not hesitate to contact us.  https://www.tu.berlin/planen-bauen-umwelt/cip29/ausstattung-und-leistungen/service/preise  The posters should be uploaded to ISIS here until the 31st of July 11:59 pm.  Best regards,  Vanessa

Discussions.Discussion_Name: M4 SE PPP2_A SuSe 2024: cancellation of today's seminar

Messages.Author: Vanessa Vogel
Messages.Content: Dear all, I'm sorry to inform you that today's seminar cannot take place. Best wishes,  Vanessa

Messages.Author: Enrico Gualini
Messages.Content: Hi, I have created three Etherpads in case you want to use them for group discussions. Please also remember to make use of Zotero for literature (the link should have been sent to you). Regards

Messages.Author: Vanessa Vogel
Messages.Content: Dear students, Please remember to fill out the questionnaire "list of participants" until the next session on April 30th to confirm your participation.  Apart from that, I invited all participants to the Zotero group of our seminar. I hope you received the e-mail (addressed to your TU e-mails) and I would kindly ask you to join the group in order for us to share literature within our presentation groups and with the others.  Thank you!
